description: Creates a site to site VPN local customer gateway.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Cidr.description: The CIDR block that needs to be routed through this gateway.

Dpd.description: If DPD is enabled for the related VPN connection (defaults false).

EspLifetime.description:
The ESP lifetime of phase 2 VPN connection to this
VPN Customer Gateway in seconds (defaults 86400).

EspPolicy.description: The ESP policy to use for this VPN Customer Gateway.

Gateway.description: The public IP address of the related VPN Gateway.

IkeLifetime.description:
The IKE lifetime of phase 2 VPN connection to this
VPN Customer Gateway in seconds (defaults 86400).

IkePolicy.description: The IKE policy to use for this VPN Customer Gateway.

IpsecPsk.description: The IPSEC pre-shared key used for this gateway.

Name.description: The name of the VPN Customer Gateway.

Project.description:
The name or ID of the project to create this VPN Customer
Gateway in. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
